title: Self Care: Reflection
description: For YOU. Questions to ask yourself. Use this for journaling, meditation, or a quiet moment alone.

cards.content: How am I really feeling right now?
What is draining my energy the most lately?
What is giving me energy right now?
cards.back: How can you get more of this?

cards.content: What is one thing I need to forgive myself for?
Who am I trying to please?
What would I do today if I wasn't afraid?
What does my ideal morning look like?
Am I holding onto a relationship that hurts me?
What is a boundary I need to set?
What is one small win from today?
What am I currently procrastinating?
When was the last time I felt truly alive?
What does 'success' mean to me right now?
What is a habit I want to break?
What is a habit I want to build?
Who makes me feel safe?
What is the kindest thing I can do for myself today?
What am I grateful for right now?
What part of my life feels out of balance?
If money didn't matter, what would I be doing?
What is a compliment I struggle to accept?
Am I being kind to my body?
What is a recurring thought that stresses me out?
What am I looking forward to?
What is a hard truth I'm avoiding?
Who do I need to stop comparing myself to?
What brings me peace?
What is my biggest fear right now?
What did I love doing as a child that I stopped doing?
Am I listening to my intuition?
What is one thing I like about my appearance?
What is one thing I like about my personality?
What does my inner child need right now?
Who can I ask for help?
cards.back: You don't have to do it alone.

cards.content: What is a resentment I am holding onto?
If I could write a letter to my younger self, what would it say?
Where do I want to be in 5 years?
What makes me feel powerful?
Am I saying 'yes' when I want to say 'no'?
What is the last mistake I made?
What is something I want to learn?
Do I like the person I am becoming?
What needs to change in my daily routine?
What emotions am I suppressing?
Who drains my energy?
What is a goal I gave up on?
cards.back: Should I pick it back up?

cards.content: What is the best advice I would give a friend in my situation?
What am I most proud of in my life?
If I had one year left to live, what would I change?
What makes me feel unique?
Am I getting enough rest?
What is a lie I tell myself?
What makes me feel guilty?
What is one thing I can control right now?
What is one thing I cannot control?
How do I define happiness?
What is a nice thing I can do for someone else?
What am I most excited about this week?
How would I describe myself in 3 words?
What is my mantra for today?
